website_summaries.verdict: A premium dog bed with an ultra plush lining and well-padded sides that will have your dog cradled in the lap of luxury.
pros: Extra soft and cozy for supreme comfort
Machine washable and dryer safe for easy cleaning
Hypoallergenic faux fur and nylon construction delivers an excellent blend of comfort and water-resistance
Available in multiple colors and sizes
cons: We’d prefer a slightly thicker base, but dogs seem to love it, nevertheless

customer_reviews.title: Not what it looks
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn’t impressed. It’s fluffy like it looks but there is no padding on the bottom on ones I received. I have to put something under it so the dog isn’t on the hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great bed as long as you Do Not Machine Wash or dry
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bed and so did my Dolly, the Cavachon puppy. However, the first time I washed it on delicate cold water and then ran it through the dryer on air only and the bed came out perfect. The second time, it came out a gummy mass with only the inside pillow retaining the shaggy fur. I'm very disappointed as the bed was such a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Clear Blue

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a sturdier bed
customer_reviews.text: My pup found a big seam and immediately chewed a hole in this bed. It didn’t last an hour. I contacted the company and was told there was nothing to be done. I recommend a sturdier bed, which is unfortunate because I loved how cozy this bed appeared - for the first 45 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: ashlea

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves this donut bed. From the first ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this donut bed. From the first night home with us when he was only 8 weeks old he snuggled into this fluffy bed and went right to sleep. This bed is so soft and fluffy I can see why he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, should be a 0 star rating!
customer_reviews.text: I got the bed yesterday and it came with the top and sides of the bed completely matted. So I watched the video online that shows how to fluff it up. The bottom fluffed up nice and shaggy like the picture, but the top and sides stayed all matted. According to the video the bed was suppose to come in a vacuum sealed plastic bag. The bag I received was not vacuum sealed. Makes me wonder if they sent me someones defective return?? Sending the bed back today and I'm going to try another brand. Bad business on their part.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice, but unfortunately it is not as described
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as advertised! I received it expecting it to be "luxurious" with a lot of padding as the picture shows. What I received was far from that, it had very little padding, to where I could feel the hardwood floor underneath it. It looks very nice, but unfortunately it is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: autumn adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My Goldendoodle has been through eight beds. All of them have been ruined by her chewing through them or making a mess on them. This bed is cozy and comfortable. She absolutely LOVES it! She made a mess on it a couple of weeks after we got it, but I washed it, and it came out just fine! I bought the large, but I almost wish I had bought the smaller one because the large is HUGE. I'm still very happy with my purchase. She has not chewed through it, as the zipper is well hidden. I'm so glad I finally found a good dog bed that is long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Small is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: The “small” is huge. I have an 11 pound dog and this small could fit 5 of her. More appropriate for a 50 pound dog. Also the sides do not stand up at all as shown in the picture. They lay flat out to the side which just makes the bed even bigger and not good for a dog who likes to cuddle up. It’s jist a giant flat fuzzy mat
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B

customer_reviews.title: Great but center needs more stuffing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it matched a crate pad that I purchased already. It's very soft and the sides are plush. The other reviews that reference the center of the bed is too thin are correct. We have hard surface floors and you can feel the floor right through it. I purchased a round memory foam chair pad to go underneath to provide padding for the center.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: So look out for the best price.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES it! At first I ordered it at $35 but then the next day it was $25. So look out for the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: NOT machine washable!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was nice and soft when I bought it. I just washed it according to instructions (machine wash, tumble dry on low) and it came out completely matted and ruined. This is definitely NOT machine washable and now it feels much less soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mila D.

customer_reviews.title: Pulled apart in a week
customer_reviews.text: My 11 lbs chihuahua loves this bed but this morning I noticed stuffing exposed. I checked to see if there was chewed material or seam came loose but it is an area in the bed that looks like it pulled apart or frayed. It was not wet or matted anywhere on the bed. I'm very disappointed for the price that was paid. I have the cuddle bed by Sheri as well we will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: SWestlake

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed but fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, our puppy loved this bed when it arrived. It's super soft and fluffy, and the bed fits nicely with home decor as it's not the standard look of a pet bed. However, I'm shocked and disappointed in the overall quality. The bed is supposed to be washable to keep clean easily. Well, tonight I tried to wash the bed for the second time since having it and I have at least half of the stuffing contents in my washing machine. The bed is destroyed! Definitely not durable or washable as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: KeeKee

customer_reviews.title: Very little support/ dog thinks it’s a toy, not a bed
customer_reviews.text: Since opening the package and placing the bed exactly where her old bed was, she is pulling the thing around the house and treating it like a toy she has to rip up. Also in another review that I agree with it mentioned that the center bottom of it hardly has any cushion or support and that is exactly right. You basically feel the hard floor. It may look big and fluffy but it is not supported by much at all. I can see where this ma be good for a very light weight dog because they wouldn’t have enough weight to push down through the fibers but my 30 pound dog will not feel any cushion beneath her.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious when ordering - Ordered another one and it was not the same brand and is awful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one last week for my dog and I loved it. Re-ordered another one for our other dog and this is not the same product. The one that arrived today is awful and makes a crunchy sound when you sit on it. The first order was by Bestfriends by Sheri and the second is Pawsh the donut cuddler. The one that arrived today is being returned. Very unhappy at the moment since I was expecting the same product and received something completely different and not at all the same quality as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved
customer_reviews.text: Rocko loves his new bed! The tan is a nice light color with a grayish undertone. Actually looks nice and not like a cheap fleece or Sherpa. And Rocko loves it. It kind of bubbles up around his back and his head can rest on the bolstered side. Great quality bed, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Matting up after 2 1/2 Months and only 2 washes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two beds. Like them and the dogs like them and now one of them is matting up and looks terrible. Been washed twice and only one of them is matting. Very Disappointed. AND there is NO WAY TO CONTACT the seller or company to notify them or return/exchange. This should NOT be an "Amazon's Choice" product.
customer_reviews.author: Dav R

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame because the bed itself is beautiful, super fluffy and soft my pup loved it! HOWEVER, claims to be washable but as soon as you do (per instructions included with the bed) it literally destroyed the bed. No longer fluffy, no longer soft or beautiful. From one single wash looks like it's about 5 years old. Amazon took care of a refund but warning to others, purchase something else!
customer_reviews.author: THE BEAUTY BO$$

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Day one - Grizzy absolutely loves this bed. He is 15 years old and still active. I was hesitant about buying another bed at this stage, but I'm so glad I did. This bed is awesome, cozy, lightweight, washable, and best of all...a winner in the eyes of our precious senior boy. He actually gave lots of kisses of approval (clearly excited) and has fallen asleep in it (snoring!) twice already today. No regrets whatsoever. Update: A couple of weeks later, I'm still very happy with the purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rainforest

customer_reviews.title: My dog hated it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star because my dog HATED this bed. He wouldn’t go near it. I tried laying on the bed and he litterally climbed on top of me so as not to touch the bed. We put treats on it... NOTHING would work. I tried washing the cover and putting it on his old bed- NOPE he didn’t want to touch the material he cover is made out of. Seems to me like it would be a dream to sleep on... my dog had a different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Corkern

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not washable
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased when this bed came, my new puppy loved it. She's a big snuggler and likes to feel secure, so this bed was perfect. Until she had had an accident in the bed and I needed to clean it. It came out of the washer fine but fully matted in the dryer. I own other faux fur machine washables and I've never had an issue with them matting in my dryer. This is just very cheaply made. I'm really disappointed. Who would make a dog bed you can't wash?
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy amazon warehouse reconditioned product
customer_reviews.text: The amazon warehouse product talked about damaged packaging. Returned unopened and resold. What I got was a dog bed that smelled when I opened the box. My dogs went crazy trying to get at it to smell it. It smelled like wet dirty dog and urine. This is a used item. Not a repackaged or damaged warehouse item. They should not be selling returned, uncleared items with biological body oils and waste on it. Soft items should not be resold as they can carry and spread fleas, ticks, mites. I bagged up immediately and put it outside. You should not endanger people’s homes and pets. Description is very misleading not clear it’s been used by a pet and returned dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: No stuffing in the very center = no support for small dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Maltese puppy. The very center of the puff has zero support (you can feel the ground). For a Maltese puppy at less that 3lbs now, and 7lbs max when grown, this does not work. Great color and liked the fabric (soft). But it needs stuffing in the center (it's kind of configured to be a donut but this means when the pooch snuggles in the center, they are on the ground, in this instance wood). Does not work for my pup or breed. Annoyed I didn't listen to reviews and now have to waste my time returning to a UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Will cause cat and dog fights
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed for our senior dog because his other bed just wasn't working for him anymore. Looks like I'm going to have to buy a second one because our cat loves the bed too and he doesn't share so well. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, but bottom bottoms out!
customer_reviews.text: Just received so can say nothing regarding Durability durability or cleaning. But my dogs went nuts over it! They do not want to get out of it! Padding at bottom seems well padded. I bent down with my knees to check padding in the bottom my knees did not hit the floor—good sign UPDATE a couple of weeks after purchase. The bottom lost all of its padding!!!! It just drifted to the sides. No way to permanently fix this so I unzipped the bottom and added a folded blanket. Problem solved I think. Too bad this is such a problem as I sent the small one back due to same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper in Millville

customer_reviews.title: Has held up great
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this until it had been through the wash a few times, especially since I read several reviews that said it didn’t hold up. Luckily, this one has had no problems getting washed or getting tossed around by a big dog. I bought this for my min pin but the big dog and the cat both love it too. It’s soft and cozy, and it’s actually larger than I anticipated (I didn’t pay close attention to the measurements and assumed it would be smaller). It’s a great dog bed for little dogs who like to get cozy, and it washes well with no fraying or matting.
customer_reviews.author: Em R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bed came matted and even after following all directions, 2 sides were matted and looked awful. Not fluffy like advertised. Extremely disappointed, especially for the price. Tried to contact seller, no response. Will not purchase from this seller or this company again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beds sold as ‘Small’ vary from order to order
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the bed on the right in the photo. My little dog loved it so much that I clicked “Buy It Again” on my order summary and purchased two more exactly like the first. As you can see in the photo, the bed on the left...my reorder...is NOT exactly like it. They are definitely not the same size. The snuggly center is too big for my little one and the outer rim is much smaller. When each of them arrived I shook them out and fluffed them in the dryer with air only...as instructed. Because this bed is not as small my dog avoids it. I think quality control has not been good.
customer_reviews.author: kherm1221

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog CARRIES her bed with her! This is her favorite thing and only bed she will sleep in. Before this bed she wouldn’t sleep in any bed, and since getting this she won’t go without it. Our first finally started getting rough after about 10-14 months of hard use. We got our second one and she was so happy. Cleans super easy. We kept second for outside because she loves to take her bed out and sun in it. If you have “fluff” issues in opening just throw it in the dryer on your no heat seating for about 30-60 minutes. Ours always comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Roman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this delivered this today. My 8 pound Shih Tzu loves it. Recommend. *update, her brother decided to join. They are loving this bed. He’s a corgi/doxie mix, 18 pounds, to give an idea on size of bed. This is the 23x23 bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the large size in the frost color for our GSP puppy. We wanted it to still be cozy when he’s full size. He has spent most of the day curled up in his new bed. He’s even chosen it over his favorite toys. He’s in love!! Also the frost color is gorgeous. It looks very nice in our living room. *UPDATE* This bed did not stay fluffy and pretty. The cushions inside lump up and do not stay how you arrange them in the zipper and the bed itself is matted and ugly now. Very disappointed for the price! Getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Bummed! Low heat ruined mine
customer_reviews.text: I am super bummed. The reviews were great on this and I was very excited about it. I followed unpacking instructions exactly. Pulled fibers apart and put in dryer. The dryer singed it! I had the dryer on low as instructed. Double checked it was low when I pulled out. The bed is no longer all soft and cozy:( There are parts of it that singed together as if I took a lighter to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin' Life

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The outer layer is soft and appealing, however, the fluff inside the outer ring arrived at about 50% of what they show in photos and the center bed portion is completely flat! No fluff inside it at all. I sent an email to the seller asking if this is the standard and what is to be expected or if maybe it was defective- it’s been more than a week now and no answer from the seller. Don’t waste your money and don’t disappoint your pet! I will only buy a pet bed in person from now to make sure it’s fluffy enough for what my dog deserves!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all! Avoid it, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Will not last you, has no cushioning whatsoever just looks pretty. I fell for the picture and ordered it cause I like how it looked but my puppy never liked sleeping on it because it’s not comfy at all, the fur is soft and that’s the only positive I have. The only time my puppy usually only went to lay on it was to chew at the fur. Not made to last, a puppy can chew through it no problem. Best to avoid in my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Niket Lamsal

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: When this bed arrived, I read the instructions on how to fully fluff up the soft, soft fibers since it comes vacuum packed. The process was very easy and worked beautifully. But the real test would come from my dog. Score? A perfect 10. She instantly jumped into the bed as soon as I put it down. She did her several turn arounds and settled into her comfy donut bed. I was finally able to get rid of the old bed and when my dog isn't at my feet or lying down outside she is in her new bed. Thank you for making a fussy Chihuahua very happy. And I, too.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. JarvisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: The best (READ ME !!!)
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltese LOVES his new bed it’s so soft and warm and cuddly and it’s beautiful in my living room UPDATE: so I bought the “ortho mat” for my beagle I paid $45 for this thing it is NOTHING like the pic super thin cheap material and cheap cheap foam insert. No way had I seen this in person first would I have bought it. I can buy a bigger more stuffed and cozy bed for $10-$20 at Walmart or tractor supply. So for $45 I say NO. Don’t waste ur money it is so thin and cheaply made and nothing “ortho” about it
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, but not for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a terrible dog bed, but I definitely wouldn’t buy again for the price. The greatest feature is that the entire bed is washable, and I’ve washed several times with no issue. HOWEVER the center of the bed had a cushion that was so thin. I had to add 2 regular human pillows to the bottom to make it feel like it was doing more than just sitting on the floor. For a $130 dog bed I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: MaylynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This poor quality product is not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT what I ordered. FIRST: I ordered a SMALL taupe bed. This is a MEDIUM frost bed. SECOND: This product appears poorly made compared to my previous purchase. The seems are visible and can not be hidden by fluffing up the fur. I’m worried that my pup will find the exposed seems in 2 seconds and chew them opened. I am totally disappointed. I previously ordered a small taupe bed ~ and I was delighted. The reason I used Sherri’s Calming Shag Vegan solutions is because my previous order was shipped from China. I wanted something made outside of China ; however, this experience with your company will drive me to look for some other company.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vandervennet

customer_reviews.title: Do not put it in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I received this dog bed, it arrived exactly the way it looked in the pictures. Super soft and LOVED LOVED the texture of it. It comes shrink wrapped and had a note in the bag to put it in your dryer to loosen the fibers in the fabric, which I did and unfortunately it matted up. It looks terrible, I wish I didn't put it in my dryer. I bought it because of the way it looked and loved how soft it was, it's just a matted mess now. So take it from me.....do not put it in the dryer. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Courtois

customer_reviews.title: the fur mats up after washing
customer_reviews.text: It is only November and this dog bed looks nothing like the one we bought. After washing it the fur all matted up and looks like we have had it for 10 years. If I could have contacted the seller I would have instead of giving a bad review. I did send a photo. We have 2 other dog beds similar to this one and neither one did this.
customer_reviews.author: daisylittle

customer_reviews.title: Two different beds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed last month ( small size for my Yorkie) and it was fantastic, however when I decided to order another one it is very different and I’m returning. The first one is plush with a well made bottom and under the fluff is a white base. The second one is thin, bottom is made of cheap material and has a black base under the fluff. Seems like 2 different beds. I really liked this bed and not sure why the second one is so different! Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this bed but unfortunately it only lasted for two weeks. The material is so thin that it ripped and I tried to sew it but it simply ripped again. I am very disappointed after spending over $130.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra N.

customer_reviews.title: A big hit among male Bichon Frise
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and plush this dog bed is; however, the day after receiving it, it already had a hole in the side and my dogs started ripping the stuffing out. Another important thing to mention is that my 2 male Bichons (both neutered btw) cannot stop humping the dog bed. Literally. Non. Stop. I’ve had to place it in a blocked off room of the house until I can figure out how to mend the hole. One of my dogs will stand there and whine, wanting in. We all know what he wants🙄
customer_reviews.author: OhioGrown83

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle Worthy soft bed! Pup approved!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this photo speaks for itself! It couldn't have been more than five minutes since I had unboxed it, when I looked over and saw him completely cuddled up. Quality is very nice - the fur is very soft, and the color is true to the product photos shown. Love that the bottom is a waterproof fabric. I wish the bed were slightly bigger (to accommodate both of my dogs, as they like to curl up together). For scale reference, my dog in the photo is a 16lb small framed Boston Terrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like the beds, although seems poor quality/pretty overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My dogs each have one of these beds and really like them. They’re generally pretty easy to take the covers off and wash. I think they’re overpriced for a simple dog bed (the stuffing isn’t especially high quality as you’ll see when you wash it). I’ve also found the stitching to be quite weak. It seems to come apart pretty easily and my dogs don’t chew/etc on their beds. Because the bed is so expensive I’ve sewn parts of it back together 3-4 times to avoid replacing, but for this price it should really be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for my mini dachshund after dog sitting a friends little dog who brought her bed and my pup loved it. I ordered a small and it is way too big, that’s why I gave it 3 stars. Both my standard dachshund and mini can fit in it with extra room. Definitely not a small. Pics show friends bed versus the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage! The instructions say to put it in the dryer to fluff it up for a couple minutes when you first get it. I did that with no heat and it totally distorted the whole entire thing! The material is almost completely matted and and now it’s lopsided. It’s very cheaply made and I doubt it would ever make it through an actual wash cycle. I tried to contact customer service and they just want to play games and pretend like they can’t find my Amazon order number. This this is going into the trash where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: SS1981

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG BED I EVER BOUGHT! My JRT loves to burrow and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active Jack Russell and I bought this in the medium size. OMG - he LOVES it!! He was having territorial issues with our couch, so I decided to get him his very own cozy bed. He loves to snuggle and burrow and be up against something while he sleeps. This did the trick! He no longer goes on the couch. If there was a bed for burrowing dogs or dog in general that like to be super comfy - THIS IS IT! The durability is great, extremely soft too. Very impressed...
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality—Padding goes flat in days
customer_reviews.text: The bed went flat within about a week of use. My dog only sleeps on this bed in my bedroom at night and the middle section is already completely flat, and you can feel the floor underneath with no pressure. It’s too bad because I like the look of the bed and the fabric seems cozy. Plan on buying real padding to add to this in case you mistakenly buy this as well, or just be smart and buy a higher quality bed to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable and washable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and was gifted another for a rescue dog. She's 13 pounds and just loves being in her little bed(s). I did have to wash one the other day and was super impressed with the fact you really can just toss this in the washer and dryer and it held it beautifully. It's a really great product and is so pretty to have in my home, one on each level for my beautiful new dog. Thank you for creating such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: barbara berg

customer_reviews.title: Maggie loves her comfort bed.
customer_reviews.text: My fur-baby has fear issues, she spends almost the entire day in the bedroom under the sheets. I have had this bed now for a few weeks and I have it in the living room by my chair. Maggie has been coming out of the bedroom now for several hours a day to lay on her new bed. I believe it makes her feel safe. I am very happy with this bed and what it is doing for Maggie. Maggie is a rescue that I have had for 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but not for my picky cat!
customer_reviews.text: I took a big risk ordering this pet bed after reading so many negative reviews from cat owners. But I wanted to give it a try. This bed is really well made, lightweight and pretty, but my cat will have nothing to do with it. We tried everything to entice him to get in, or stay in, but he just didn’t like it. (This is the size small—good size for a cat). Don’t know if it’s the unstable bottom and sides, or an odor, but it was a bomb! I’m going to give it to my friend’s chihuahua. He’s not so picky. Or maybe I’ll just return it.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreamin'

customer_reviews.title: Hugely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is *not at all* what the photo shows. Maybe it works for smaller sizes but in extra large, it's a sad, floppy, hardly-filled blob of fake fur. While the fur is soft for sure and it's attractive unlike than most dog beds, this thing is not worth the money at all, like at all. The dog won't lay on it because there's practically no stuffing in the middle, the edges are not tall. You can feel the floor through it. What's the point? Could not be more disappointed in this dog bed. What a rip off. So, kudos for a nice looking, furry soft bed but I wouldn't even pay $20 for something this flimsy. Being returned.
customer_reviews.author: mike fezatte

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger bed (different manufacturer) for my Westie and Yorkie mix to share... of course they don't! so I ordered this one for my Yorkie because a smaller size was not available like the one I have. the description shows that the rim height is 9", like the one I have...great! well, not so much. it does not have enough filling to hold up a Yorkie's head so instead of returning I will open a seam and add some fluff as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: SharonS

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$
customer_reviews.text: Confused why this has good reviews. I did everything the instructions said. The middle of this bed went right to the floor. Even if this had a zipper I’d return. Not worth $35. My 15lb Jack Russell would flatten this out in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Ripped open on day 1
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! This bed is beautiful and my dog loved it right away. But the very first night when he gently pawed at it to settle in (as dogs do) it ripped a giant hole right open. A bed for dogs should be able to withstand gentle pawing. This is just not good quality. To top it off now I have to carry this giant thing all the way back to the UPS store to return it in order to get a refund. Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: LJC

customer_reviews.title: Lloyd will drag this bed into any room we’re in to enjoy our company in comfort
customer_reviews.text: My dog can’t live without this bed. It’s his toy, his comfort and his friend that he takes with him everywhere. Lloyd will drag this bed into any room we’re in to enjoy our company in comfort! (And style!!) the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because a hole popped where the seam is and from there Lloyd was able to make it worse. I worried about him swallowing the stuffing so I had to throw it out. I’m re-ordering but bummed to pay $70 in 6 months on dog beds.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bella has not gotten out of this bed since I put it down for her, except to eat and go out. She totally loves her bed. As soon as we get back in the door from a walk, she trots right over to her bed and dives back in. I can't say anything about durability just yet, we've only had it a few days. I know it's washable, but as I got her a large bed since she likes to sprawl out, I don't think it will fit in my washing machine. Bella and I are thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Louise Vanick

customer_reviews.title: She Loves Her New Bed
customer_reviews.text: Zoey has slept in my bed every night sense the day I brought her home. She actually jumped down from my bed last night so she could sprawl out in hers. It took her about a day to get in it, but now that she has, she doesn’t want to sleep anywhere else. I haven’t washed it yet, so I’ll have to up date you when I do. It’s more plush then it looks online, and seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D

customer_reviews.title: Followed Instructions and damaged it right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on arrival are to put this bed in the dryer on LOW HEAT to fluff the fibers. I followed this to the letter and in FIFTEEN MINUTES it had already started melting the fur where it touched the interior of the dryer. I got this for my senior malamute, but it definitely doesn't seem anywhere near as appropriately supportive as the memory foam beds we already have.
customer_reviews.author: Kait from MS

customer_reviews.title: This was love at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. I have been looking at beds like this for a year - watching prices, reading reviews, etc. I found this on Amazon. It had good reviews. I found this one and it was less expensive than any I had looked at. Reviews were great. They arrived in a very thin box. I was concerned but they were vacuum packed. When you Open the box, there are instructions as to how to fluff it up. It also says to throw up the dryer to fluff the, i dud all of that. My dogs LOVED these immediately! I couldn’t be more pleased. I highly recommend buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: My doggies love this bed! We ordered the 30” and it’s perfect for either of our pups (one’s medium size and the other is medium-large). Ever since I placed the bed on the floor, the dogs immediately gravitated toward it and have been taking turns in it all day. It seems to be the perfect amount of support and comfort. The bed itself is adorable and perfectly aligned with our decor. This is the second bed I’ve ordered from this same company—the first was ruined due to puppy behavior—and I am incredibly impressed by the quality and appearance. I highly recommend this dog bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressed
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are deceiving. Like many fluffy things once you put any weight on it, it squashes down. My dog is 10 pounds, I would not recommend it for any dog bigger than that because the pillow in the middle flattens down with weight. Its donut shaped with a pillow in the middle. The gap between the sides and middle is big, so instead of holding the dog up, the dog falls into the gap. As for the durability, its hard to tell after 1 day. Like I said, not impressed. Edited a few days later: Im not impressed but my dog prefers it over his $75 orthopedic bed.
customer_reviews.author: Never a dull moment

customer_reviews.title: No bottom padding
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mention the padding on the bottom is not enough to support the weight of the dog even a 4lb chi. I ended up putting a blanket on the bottom of the bed. Also, the side seem just split and the side stuffing is coming out. I need to sow it up. Not worth the money. My previous dog bed was a cheap one from Target and was much better. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Star

customer_reviews.title: I like it; my cat not so much
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice, it's soft, fluffy and looks like any cat would love it. Mine, not so much. Admittedly, my cat is unpredictably goofy, but she would only stay on this bed if it had a ratty old blanket on top - the blanket I was hoping to be able to get rid of. She gave it a go for a few weeks, but now avoids both the bed and the blanket. No amount of petting, soothing, treats, cajoling will keep her in/on it. Oh well, should've known better.
customer_reviews.author: girl from TN

customer_reviews.title: Wash Before Using If You and/or Your Dog Are Prone to Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. HOWEVER, he and I both had pretty severe allergy problems caused by it. I took it out of the box, and followed the instructions on how to fluff it up. I then took it out of the dryer, and my dog eagerly tried it out. I started having itching in my throat, and my dog started licking his underside, and then digging at his mouth. Both my dog and I took allergy medication to stop the symptoms. I put the bed into the washer, and ran it through two wash cycles. It was fine after being washed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Chart is Way Off!! Update: Resolved Sizing Issue_Happy Fur Baby
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart was extremely inaccurate. Our dog is 50 lbs so we purchased the 36" x 36" as recommended however when we opened the bed it was huge! The bed was twice the size of our dog which defeats the purpose of a "nesting" bed. We had to return the bed; however, we do plan on purchasing a smaller size. The quality of the bed itself was fabulous! Update: Once we returned the large bed and received our refund, we ordered a medium size bed 30" x 30", which is perfect for a 50 lb dog to nest. Our furry baby girl is very happy with the medium size bed and we are very satisfied with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: MissyD

customer_reviews.title: Color looks nothing like the pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: The color looks like a person who needs their hair dyed. Dark with color showing at the base of the strands and the beige color growing out. It is ugly looking. So disappointed that I am sending it back. I did not want to leave this review but could not find a contact for the seller. I want to email them directly. The only positives are it is very soft and has nice padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hit With My Cats!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law purchased one of these beds for her small dog and the dog loved it so much that I decided to check into one for our cats. I actually bought two of them. These were an instant hit with our cats! When they are sleeping, they enjoy snuggling their heads into the "edge" on the inside. As instructed, I fluffed them in the dryer before using them. I didn't rate cleanability or durability because I haven't had them long enough. However, based on our daughter-in-law's experience (she's had her bed for at least 6 months) the fluffy stuff doesn't rip off with animal-use and it looks great after multiple washing/drying.
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Hype or Truth?? Only you can decide.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these beds, first I bought one for my cat. She does not like it, my 2 Chihuahuas will use it because I took up their older one. Does it live up to the hype? Not in my house. I'm really disappointed, I thought I was buying them all something they would really like. I read all the reviews, and they convinced me to spend 100.00 on beds, again. So, just know that not every animal is going to worship this bed, then decide to spend your money.
customer_reviews.author: GamingLadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this for my pup because he LOVESSSSS the bed. He loved it, I should say. It only took me washing it 3 times for me to hate it. The thin mesh that holds the stuffing is SO weak that if you have a dog that burrows (most of us do) he/she will cause small scrapes in the mesh through the fur covering it. Third wash and all the stuffing is ALL OVER my washing machine. I’m now searching for a better made dog bed. If you don’t care about having clean dog beds, get it. If you want something that can withstand your dogs burrowing AND be washed, go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jalena

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pictures of this dog bed but disappointed when it was delivered. Looked good on arrival but the center base my 13 lb dog sleeps on has minimal cushioning. After one month I can report that one of the sides is slumping and the center base has only gotten more worn down with use. My dog does not use this bed spontaneously and only uses when I direct her to it at bedtime. She definitely isn't excited to be in it or dragging it around the house as her favorite place to lie down. Too bad too, because if they had just added padding to the center base it would be fine. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BOTHER, TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY, WASHES HORRIBLY!!! MATTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a JOKE, I put it in the dryer on low for 5 min. to freshen it up and it came out a matted mess!! It's unfortunate that I cannot return this item as it is not my fault that this happened, I followed the directions to a T!! I would appreciate at least a partial refund or an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework before purchasing!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product to come for my new puppy when she arrived. First night she peed on the cuddler I put it in the wash but was terrified due to some of the reviews. I let it air dry overnight. Several weeks go by and the cuddler is loosing it shape due to the puppy always jumping in it 3lb Morkie should not have that much of an effect on the cuddler. Puppy peed on it again put the cuddler in the wash and this time became all matted was not happy at all especially when I let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This looked so soft and snuggly I had to buy it for my shih tzu. He wouldn't even get inside it and frankly I don't blame him. The bottom (where he is supposed to lay) was made of nylon or some similar material, not the soft fuzzy faux fur that was pictured. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H.

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: A lovely bed. The cat took to it right away. She looked so cute all cozy in the fur. I ordered the 23" tan one. Unfortunately it ended up being quite a bit larger than one medium sized cat needs. If you have two or three smaller ones, that like to sleep together, it's perfect. So I had to send it back. The fur is also not as dense as it looks in the picture, and a little of the dark material underneath peaks through when you brush your fingers through it, but it's still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Donna

customer_reviews.title: Likely to become your pet's favorite spot to relax
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely plush pet bed. I have purchased several beds for my Chihuahua/Italian greyhound mix, and she prefers this to any other of her unheated options (when the house is chilly, she prefers a heated bed because her fur is very short and doesn't afford much insulation). Just running my hands through the long, silky fibers that line this bed explained why my dog loves it. I'd sleep in it myself if it were large enough to accommodate me! If you really want to treat your pet to a place to sleep or relax in opulent comfort, this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Unmasker

customer_reviews.title: It is okay, the sides are not as firm/fluffy as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, the sides are not as firm/fluffy as I thought it would be. Much to squishy, I thought it was more like a cat bed (what I normally get this dog). The dog likes it, she is a 15Lb dog who is cold often, so she like the snuggle factor. The only down side is, she thought it was toy at firs because it is the same fabric as her stuffed toys. She gutted the center part, and I stuffed it back in. She has not messed with it since. Which means I cannot put it in the washing machine. It is okay, but I most likely wont buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: I loved it more than the cats
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried I would get a knockoff, but I received the real deal. The bed is soft and big and fluffy and sturdy..... I fell in love with it... too bad my cats didn't. They are afraid of it, not sure what the deal is, but am hoping if I leave it laying around they will get used to it. I even put in cat nip....nothing. If they do decide to love it like I do, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: SS in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Material is amazing at first .....
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to leave a negative review. Because the product is very nice. However, I returned the first one because the material s texture changed with one wash (no dryer). This second one you replaced arrived. I follow the package directions and put it in the dryer in the lowest setting for 5 minutes. And a small section once again got hard almost like too much heat from dryer. Is now hard and not plush. This is what happened to this one I just received 2 hours ago. I miss not in the mood to send this back again and wait for a new one to arrive. What would you do if you were me??
customer_reviews.author: nirvana

customer_reviews.title: Soft and EASY to Clean
customer_reviews.text: We love these beds so much. We bought a second one and now with a new puppy on the way we purchased our third one. This is so soft and our doggies love them. Our 80-82 lb lab curls up in the medium size bed. She is such a cuddle bug. We have a front loader washer and dryer, we follow all directions for washing and drying. We do not washing anything else with it when we wash and then dry on medium heat. They turn out BEAUTIFUL!!! Fluffy, soft no tangles, etc. We have recommended them several time to friends and relatives. They all love them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not the same bed as the original! A cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Shame on you for switching the snuggle bed. I bought your original, and this one doesn't not compare. It's not deep, the bottom is different, and the sides are not nearly as fluffy. It just a cheap bed. You probably found a cheaper supplier and didn't think anyone would notice. I'm returning both!!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great until after the first wash...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bed for my newly adopted Shih Poo. When I first opened the package, it came out just as it was described and shown on the photos, except (I'll have to agree with many of the other reviews), the bed part itself was not as padded and thick as it was advertised. Then when I gave it its first wash, the fur stuck together leaving it with a matted look and feel! (see photo). I'm quite disappointed. I normally don't bother leaving a review but for the price and the quality described, I felt I had to give my feedback as a consumer.
customer_reviews.author: fmces7

customer_reviews.title: Most dogs prefer this bed over others.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd bed I have purchased and I will be purchasing more. My dogs LOVE them, I have purchased other more expensive beds and they alway go back to these beds. They wash up well however the shag does start to matt after several washes. I’m sure this is pretty unavoidable for any bed over time. But this will not deter me from continuing to purchase these beds, after all they don’t last forever and for the price I can afford to replace them every year (My first bed lasted about 2 years but was looking ragged).
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Redding

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT BREATHE, results in dog overhearing.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. It feels soft and comfy. She used it immediately. After about 30 minutes, she got up panting, like she was having heat stroke. Tried it again a few days later, same result. My dog is 30 lbs, short hair, average weight, not overweight. My sister has a Cairn terrier, same thing happened to her dog. Over heated. Thinking about sending it back. Never had this happen over the years with any dog bed. The fibers don’t breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J. Rains

customer_reviews.title: His favorite place in the house
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with this bed. I got it for him because it's the same soft material of a blanket that he likes to knead and nurse on (he was a bottle baby so never had that normal cat experience). At first he wouldn't touch it, but a few days into having it I decided to put it at the end of our bed where he typically sleeps and he realized it was actually the greatest thing on the planet and made just for him. Note: I have bought him about 3 other beds in the past and he has *never* used them. This bed is a win!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Dane took one spin around it and laid down unfortunately his well trimmed nails must have ripped it🤷‍♀️ I’m waiting on a replacement hoping for more then 12 seconds of use this time. The replacement is in and man wha a difference. Not only has he gone in many circles with out anything leaking out but this one seem fluffier then the last one which makes me believe it was just a bad one in the batch. He slept all night with out getting in our bed so to me that’s a big win! I originally gave this a 2* now I’m changing it to 5!
customer_reviews.author: Megan O

customer_reviews.title: I swear your dog will love this bed and you will be glad you purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these beds. They are so comforting to my dogs. They are no trouble to maintain just wash and dry. That is if you can get them done in one day as my dogs dont like to be without them. My dogs accepted these beds from day one and when I bought my first one in 2018, I knew these beds would be the only bed I would ever buy. My senior dogs, Sammy, Curly, Louie, Benji, Gracie, Sparky, and puppy Izze all give a big bark and tails up for these beds. So 8 beds later, I say thank you to Sherri for making them available. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Doggie and granddaughter approved.
customer_reviews.text: We rescued our miniature schnauzer doggie from Mexico just over 3 wks ago. I wanted something extremely comfortable for her to lay in once she arrived and saw a bunch of others who rescued dogs from the same transport were using this. So I ordered it immediately. Our Maizie loves it! And as you can see from the 2nd photo, so does our granddaughter 😂. My only small "complaint " is I wish the bottom had more cushioning. It seems very thin and flat. But the doggie loves it, so I guess that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The dog gives it 10 stars!  2 beds x 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bed I have purchased. Needed one for our weekend retreat. Logan is a 25 lb. Welsh Terrier who loves to curl up in a ball in the small bed. I have never seen him take to a bed like he has this one. Loves to drag it around - puts it where he wants it too. His old beds are on a stack in the basement waiting for me to haul them to the shelter. The purchase of this bed was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a donut bed for my dog a few years ago, and he was due for a new one. That brand was no longer available on Amazon so I picked one that seemed similar. When it arrived, it was not as puffy and fluffy as it looked in the images, so I returned it. Then I ordered this one. It arrived, and it's EXACTLY what it should be: plenty of stuffing, nice and fluffy, and when I put it out at home my dog immediately laid down in it. This is the one, the perfect donut bed if you want puff and fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Demet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at but....
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know how well these beds clean up or how durable they are as neither of my dogs (Chihuahua and Terrier Mix) would use them. Got back in December when I thought they'd enjoy a warm cozy bed for winter, but no go. They sniffed them, hopped on, and right back off. I left them on the floor several days, but neither pooch ever used them--into the closet they went. These beds are very soft, and the color (I got white/grey) are nice, but if my dogs won't use, they are not of much use.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Perry

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy bed!  Walter says.
customer_reviews.text: I will let the photos speak for themselves! LOL Walter is a Beagle Basset. I bought a size large. Even though it is kind of big he loves it! He can stretch, hide treats, toys, roll all over. He sleeps so well in it, he snores pretty loud and smiles. That is all the acknowledgement I need to know he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our little Shih Tzu is extremely spoiled and will not sleep on just any bed. We have given away several beds simply because she won't get near them. We think it has something to do with the smell of the material. When we received the Best Friends bed we just set in the corner and didn't make a big deal of it. Within minutes she climbed into the new bed and went to sleep. She loved the soft material and plushy comfort. She's still spoiled, but now she's a well rested spoiled dog.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for all puppies
customer_reviews.text: My puppy chewed the bed apart and took out the stuffing. She did not like to lay in it and we had to put it up. Every time I tried to get her to lay in it she continued to chew it and I can no longer return it. Sad because it looked like a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Melloy

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed I've come across! Pug loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and comfort level of this pet bed! It's my pugs new favorite place to lounge, when it first arrived she crawled right into it and fell asleep for hours. It's soft and has a lot of cushion, she digs around in it to get comfortable and so far it's proved to be very durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Magical Bed with Magical Powers
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to cuddle, so the fact that this bed completely envelopes makes it one of his favorite places to retreat. The day we got it, he peed on it, which is unorthodox for him, so I tossed it into the wash with a Tidepod and it came out the dryer fluffy and new. You are supposed to put it in the dryer upon receipt, so it wasn't a big deal. My dog will stay put all night in this bed. Friends who have dogs that won't sleep through the night tried this bed and said it worked like a miracle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karla T

customer_reviews.title: Kiki love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Donut Cuddler bed for our new puppy. Unfortunately, due to the delay in shipping because of Coronavirus we had to wait three weeks for it to arrive. I went to one of the big pet stores and bought another bed to Kiki had a place to sleep until her Donut Cuddler arrived. She seemed happy with the other bed, The Donut Cuddler finally arrived a few days ago and Kiki loves it. She has not been near her other bed since. The Donut Cuddler looks great, is super comfortable and is washable. If only they made a larger size Donut Cuddler for me!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Shag is all matted after fluffing I’m dryer as instructed
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the bed, I tossed it in my dryer on low to fluff as instructed on the insert that case with the bed. It was only in the dryer for less than 5 mins and now the “shag” is all matted along the top edge! Looked great before I followed the instructions. I would definitely not recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M. L. N.

customer_reviews.title: THE PRODUCT ADVERTISED IS NOT THE PRODUCT RECEIVED!  THIS IS A KNOCK OFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: The dog bed is very soft and fluffy, however, I was very disappointed to learn the portion of the bed where the dog actually lies down is not fluffy or soft! It’s actually plastic. My dog is not interested in getting in the bed. He will not curl up in the bed! He actually lies with the front half of his body on the edge of the bed and the back half on the floor. This is not acceptable! This was not a wise purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: For the kids

product_meta.title: Best Friends by Sheri The Original Calming Shag Vegan Fur Donut Cuddler (Multiple Sizes)
product_meta.description: Color:Taupe| Size:Donut Small 23"With ultra-soft and cushioned walls all the way around, your dog or cat is sure to feel loved and comforted while napping in the Best Friends by Sheri Donut bed. The interior and exterior of this bed is made with faux fur/shag material that is unbelievably soft to the touch. The bottom of the bed is made with tough nylon fabric that resists both dirt and water. You will appreciate that the bed is conveniently safe to machine wash and dry (machine wash gentle cycle, Tumble dry very low heat) keeping it free of hair and odors. Sizing: 23x23 (up to 25 lbs. ), 30x30 (up to 45 lbs. ). All Best Friends by Sheri products are made with the utmost attention to quality.
feature_bullets: Supports better sleep: Thanks to its round shape, our high-quality donut coddler puppy bed is ideal for pets who love to curl up! The raised rim creates a sense of security and provides head and neck support, while the super-soft filling offers joint and muscle pain relief

Superior Comfort: Cozy, flexible and finished with faux shag fur, our self-warming luxury dog bed is reminiscent of a mother’s fur coat! Paired with deep crevices that allow your pet to burrow, animals will have full, restful sleep for improved behavior and better health

Versatile design: Available in BEAUTIFULLY natural colors, our pet beds are a seamless addition to any room’s décor! And because they’re finished with water and dirt-resistant bottoms, They help prevent accidental messes from reaching your floors

Pet-safe materials: durable nylon and luxurious faux fur come together to create dog mattresses that are as practical as they are comfortable! For added convenience, every bed is safe in the washing machine and dryer (Machine wash, gentle cycle. Tumble dry, low heat), minimizing pet odors and excess hair

Sizing suggestions: when choosing your dog bed, we suggest the 23x23” bed for dogs and cats up to 25lbs, The 30x30” bed for dogs and cats up to 45lbs, and the 45x45” bed for large dog breeds up to 150lbs. If you have any problems or questions, Simply reach out to our customer service team
Not suitable for puppies or dogs with excessive teething or chewing behavior
Important care instructions: To avoid matting of the Fur, It is important that the bed is thoroughly dried in dryer directly after washing. Do not Air dry

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
